description:
I set up newton on centos7 with glance, neutron, nova and keystone using repository from 'centos-release-openstack-newton' , when I try to launch an instance, I got this nova-api log errors:

2017-02-10 12:45:31.573 4019 INFO nova.api.openstack.wsgi [req-44cf5433-481e-4e1e-831f-4533ebd236aa 82c73a54064c47f788ca4b81
8ecd707e b2bae7ff93f546418ee5b78119d2bdad - default default] HTTP exception thrown: Unexpected API Error. Please report this
 at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.TypeError'>

Please find enclosed the full logs

Thanks.
title: Unexpected API Error - nova.api

comments.content:
I set up newton on centos7 with glance, neutron, nova and keynote using repository from 'centos-release-openstack-newton' , when I try to launch an instance, I got this nova-api log errors:

2017-02-10 12:45:31.573 4019 INFO nova.api.openstack.wsgi [req-44cf5433-481e-4e1e-831f-4533ebd236aa 82c73a54064c47f788ca4b81
8ecd707e b2bae7ff93f546418ee5b78119d2bdad - default default] HTTP exception thrown: Unexpected API Error. Please report this
 at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.TypeError'>


Please find enclosed the full logs

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~duckybsd

comments.content:
Sorry, it is not a bug. Although it said please report this bug.

It turns out I don't have CONF.glance.api_servers set in nova.conf on the API node.

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~duckybsd
